description.title: Description
description.description: optional description string explaining what this role represents, or what permissions are granted to it.

permissions.title: Permissions
permissions.description: list of action keys that define what actions this resource role is permitted to do

extends.title: Extends
extends.description: list of role keys that define what roles this role extends. In other words: this role will automatically inherit all the permissions of the given roles in this list.

key.title: Key
key.description: A URL-friendly name of the role (i.e: slug). You will be able to query later using this key instead of the id (UUID) of the role.

organization_id.title: Organization Id
organization_id.description: Unique id of the organization that the role belongs to.

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: Unique id of the project that the role belongs to.

environment_id.title: Environment Id
environment_id.description: Unique id of the environment that the role belongs to.

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: Date and time when the role was created (ISO_8601 format).

updated_at.title: Updated At
updated_at.description: Date and time when the role was last updated/modified (ISO_8601 format).

example.name: Editor
example.description: the editor role can read and write to documents
